description.p: Ability Score Increase. Your intelligence is increased by 2, and your dexterity by 1
Age. Void Cubes dont have a natural life cycle, they are created. This also means they are uffected by the passege of time magic that would age them.
Alignment. Void Cubes dont adhear to standard alignments, but on a standard basis, one of the Chaotic alignments.
Size. The Projected body of a Void Cube varies largely, but all are considered Medium creatures.
Speed. 30ft Walking speed, Additionally they can innately levitate on the spot
Artificial Being. Void Cubes are consideed constructs, not requiring food, water or air. but every they require an 8h rest period were they "retract" and are considered unconscius.
Languages. Void Cubes can innately speak and understand Common and Primordial.
